description: CSS file defining theme management variables and style definitions for the App component in a Tic Tac Toe web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styling for the main application component, including layout and color settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the App header section, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for the links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, and hover effects.
